TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k ɑː l s t ɛ l ɐ ɑː s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z t ɪ ŋ k s w ɪ ð ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ ʃ n oʊ p iː s f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː s æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n aɪ k f ɔːɹ ɹ ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d z ɐ s m ɔː l b l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
